Verses: 1 ungalukkaagavum Lavodhikkeyaavilirukkiravargalukkaagavum, Sareeraththil En Mugaththaik Kaanaadhirukkira Matrellaarukkaagavum Migundha Poraattam Enakku Undendru Neengal Ariya Virumbugiren.

2 avargaludaiya Irudhayangal Thetrappattu, Avargal Anbinaal Inaikkappattu, Pidhaavaagiya Dhevanukkum Kiristhuvukkum Uriya Ragasiyaththai Arindhukollugira Unarvin Poorana Nichchayaththinudaiya Ellaa Aisuvariyaththirkum Uriyavargalaagavendumendre Ippadi Virumbugiren.
3 avarukkul Gnaanam Arivu Enbavaigalaagiya Pokkishangalellaam Adangiyirukkiradhu.
4 oruvanum Nayavasanippinaale Ungalai Vanjiyaadhapadikku Idhai Sollugiren.
5 sareeraththinpadi Naan Dhooramaayirundhum, Aaviyinpadi Ungaludanekooda Irundhu, Ungal Ozhungaiyum, Kiristhuvinmelulla Ungal Visuvaasaththin Urudhiyaiyum Paarththu Sandhoshappadugiren.
6 aagaiyaal, Neengal Karththaraagiya Kiristhu Yesuvai Etrukkondapadiye, Avarukkul Verkondavargalaagavum, Avarmel Kattappattavargalaagavum, Avarukkul Nadandhukondu,
7 neengal Bodhikkappattapadiye, Visuvaasaththil Urudhippattu, Sthoththiraththode Adhile Peruguveergalaaga.

8 lowgika Gnaanaththinaalum, Maayamaana Thandhiraththinaalum, Oruvanum Ungalaik Kollaikondupogaadhapadikku Echcharikkaiyaayirungal; Adhu Manushargalin Paarambariya Niyaayaththaiyum Ulagavazhipaadugalaiyum Patrinadheyellaamal Kiristhuvaip Patrinadhalla.
9 enendraal, Dhevaththuvaththin Paripooranamellaam Sareerappiragaaramaaga, Avarukkul Vaasamaayirukkiradhu.
10 melum Sagala Dhuraiththanangalukkum Adhigaaraththukkum Thalaivaraayirukkira Avarukkul Neengal Paripooranamullavargalaayirukkireergal.
11 allaamalum, Neengal Kiristhuvaippatrum Viruththasedhanaththinaale Maamsaththukkuriya Paavasareeraththaik Kalaindhuvittadhinaal, Kaiyaal Seyyappadaadha Viruththasedhanaththai Avarukkul Petreergal.

12 gnaanasnaanaththile Avarodekooda Adakkampannappattavargalaagavum, Adhile Avarai Mariththorilirundhezhuppina Dhevanudaiya Seyalinmelulla Visuvaasaththinaale Avarodekooda Ezhundhavargalaagavum Irukkireergal.
13 ungal Paavangalinaaleyum, Ungal Maamsa Viruththasedhanamillaamaiyinaaleyum Mariththavargalaayirundha Ungalaiyum Avarodekooda Uyirppiththu, Akkiramangalellaavatraiyum Ungalukku Manniththu;
14 namakku Edhiridaiyaagavum Kattalaigalaal Namakku Virodhamaagavum Irundha Kaiyezhuththaik Kulaiththu, Adhai Naduviliraadhapadikku Eduththu, Siluvaiyinmel Aaniyadiththu;
15 thuraiththanangalaiyum Adhigaarangalaiyum Urindhukondu, Veliyarangamaana Kolamaakki, Avaigalinmel Siluvaiyile Vetrisirandhaar.
16 aagaiyaal, Bojanaththaiyum Paanaththaiyum Kuriththaavadhu, Pandikainaalaiyum Maadhappirappaiyum Oivunaatkalaiyunguriththaavadhu, Oruvanum Ungalaik Kutrappaduththaadhiruppaanaaga.
17 avaigal Varungaariyangalukku Nizhalaayirukkiradhu; Avaigalin Porul Kiristhuvaippatrinadhu.
18 kanukkalaalum Kattugalaalum Udhavipetru Inaikkappattu, Dhevavalarchchiyaai Valarndherugira Sareeramuzhuvadhaiyum Aadharikkira Thalaiyaip Patrikkollaamal,

19 maayamaana Thaazhmaiyilum, Dhevathoodhargalukkuch Cheyyum Aaraadhanaiyilum Viruppamutru, Kaanaadhavaigalile Thunivaai Nuzhaindhu, Than Maamsasindhaiyinaale Veenaai Irumaappukkondirukkira Evanum Ungal Pandhayapporulai Neengal Izhandhupogumpadi Ungalai Vanjiyaadhirukkappaarungal.
20 neengal Kiristhuvudanekooda Ulagaththin Vazhipaadugalukku Mariththadhundaanaal, Innum Ulaga Vazhakkaththinpadi Pizhaikkiravargalpola,
21 manusharudaiya Karpanaigalinpadiyum Bodhanaigalinpadiyum Nadandhu: Thodaadhe, Rusipaaraadhe, Theendaadhe Engira Kattalaigalukku Utpadugiradhenna?
22 ivaiyellaam Anubavikkiradhinaal Azhindhupogume.

23 ippadippatta Podhanaigal Suya Ishtamaana Aaraadhanaiyaiyum, Maayamaana Thaazhmaiyaiyum, Sareera Odukkaththaiyumpatri Gnaanamengira Perkondirundhaalum, Ivaigal Maamsaththaip Penugiradharke Ozhiya Matrondrirkum Pirayojanappadaadhu.
